UpdateLog.description: Small Hey everyone, another weekly update with tons of changes. The current pace I've been working at is a huge time commitment, so let's keep it going while there are bugs to report! This update I am very confident that Vehicle Caravans are in working condition. So PLEASE test very thoroughly. I'm adding balance changes each update so it's a bit more convenient to use in actual games. Again, I don't care how minor the bug or feedback is, everything helps. Thanks again! Balance ChangesSmall Rowboat (Buildable) - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 10000 to 50 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 200 - Changed costList from 1 ComponentIndustrial to 35 WoodLog - Increased Flammability from 0.05 to 0.65 Rowboat (Vehicle) - Decreased CargoCapacity from 300 to 75 - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 85 - Increased Flammability from 0 to 0.65 - Decreased Mass from 10000 to 35 Fishing Boat (Buildable) - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 10000 to 250 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 1500 - Changed costList from 35 ComponentIndustrial and 3000 Steel to 140 WoodLog - Increased Flammability from 0.05 to 0.65 Fishing Boat (Vehicle) - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 250 - Increased Flammability from 0 to 0.65 - Decreased Mass from 10000 to 200 Sparrow (Buildable) - Reduced MaxHitPoints from 5000 to 750 - Increased WorkToBuild from 30 to 85000 - Changed costList from 35 ComponentIndustrial and 3000 Steel to 12 ComponentSpacer, 500 Steel, and 250 Plasteel Sparrow (Vehicle) - Decreased MarketValue from 250000 to 175000 - Decreased Mass from 25000 to 6200 - Removed VehicleTurrets, they were for testing only and the main focus for now will just be normal flying (not strafing or bombing runs) Bug FixesSmall - Fixed bug where GenSteps would attempt to recalculate vehicle path cost when regions had not been built yet. (Fixes compatibility with Biomes Core mods) - Fixed bug where arriving skyfallers would attempt to notify VehicleTracks comp a tick after its removal. - Fixed bug with shaders where the color math would result in artifacting at the borders of the color channels. - Fixed bug where VehiclePawn would occasionally spawn inside stone chunks in an event map. - Fixed bug where AerialVehicle could be selected to drop out of bounds, resulting in the loss of the vehicle and its crew. - Fixed bug where auto-targeting VehicleTurrets' targeter would still be active even after vehicle has been despawned. - Fixed event map VehicleCaravan reformations - Fixed bug where settlement maps wouldn't take pawns inside vehicles into account when calculating points. - Fixed bug where selecting multiple pawns (with at least one of them actively reserving a vehicle) and then right clicking it would throw a reservation exception. - Fixed bug where VehicleRequestCollection wasn't saving Additional ChangesSmall - Removed irrelevant ResearchProjectDefs - Performance improvements to VehicleTurrets. - Split Patterns and Skins to separate shaders to remove all branching logic from shader files. - Added 2 ResearchProjectDefs for Rowboat and FishingBoat. More will follow later when the mod is closer to releasing. - Added SkinDefs back into the mod for testing - Improved VTOL animation of Sparrow - Changed vertical ticks to instead be a property of individual launch or land properties, allowing you to designate different tick counts for landing and launching vertical animations. Final NotesSmall Please report any issues you find https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues(here.) or on the discord server.
